pageProduct.name: Antipodes Kiwi Eye Cream Discovery Set
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Beauty icons, together at last. Water-based Apostle Skin-Brightening Serum targets pigmentation to help brighten skin and restore even tone. Vinanza® Grape & Kiwi works with Vinanza® Oxifend to address excess melanin production and help decrease redness.
International bestseller Kiwi Seed Oil Eye Cream is a must have for women concerned with reducing the signs of ageing. Formulated as a cooling, soothing treatment for the delicate eye area, Kiwi Seed Oil Eye Cream features antioxidant-rich avocado oil, carrot seed and native New Zealand manuka flower. Vanilla Pod Hydrating Day Cream feels beautifully fresh on your face. With a base of nutrient-rich avocado oil, it features antibacterial manuka honey, and captures the anti-ageing benefits of Vinanza® Grape, a revolutionary antioxidant from sauvignon blanc grape seeds.

Warnings

External Application Only. Patch Test Prior To Use. In Unlikely Event Of Negative Reaction Discontinue Use And Consult Health Practitioner. Recyclable Glass. Handle With Care. Store In Cool Dark Place Below 21°C. Colour And Clarity May Vary Between Products Due To Pure Natural Content. Gold Flakes May Dissolve And Are Not Always Visible. Love Nature

Common Uses

Skincare

Ingredients

Kiwi Eye: Aqua (water), Persea gratissima (avocado) oil, glycerin, cetearyl alcohol (coconut derived), cetearyl wheat straw glycosides, stearic acid (vegetable), glyceryl stearate, tocopherol (Vitamin E), Daucus carota sativa (carrot seed) oil, Actinidia chinensis (kiwifruit seed) oil, Borago officinalis (borage) oil, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, calcium gluconate, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Grape grape seed) extract. Vanilla Pod: Aqua (water), glycerine, squalane (olive) extract, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Macadamia integrifolia (macadamia) nut oil, Rosa canina (rosehip) oil, cetearyl alcohol, Persea gratissima (avocado pear) oil, tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, Macropiper excelsum (kawakawa) leaf extract, dehydroacetic acid; benzyl alcohol, lecithin, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Grape) seed extract, Leptospermum scoparium (mel) manuka honey. essential oil fragrances of vanilla pod and mandarin: coumarin†, d-Limonene†, linalool†.                                            † Component of essential oil Apostle: Aqua (Waiwera® artesian) water, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera juice) extract*, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern leaf) extract, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, Amigel® (sclerotium gum), Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Oxifend pinot noir grape) extract, xanthan gum, Vitis vinifera and Actinidia chinensis (Vinanza® Grape & Kiwi grape seed and kiwifruit seed) extract, Actinidia chinensis (Vinanza® Kiwi kiwifruit skin) extract, Rubus idaeus (raspberry seed) oil, Gandoderma lucidum (Reishi mushroom) extract, essential oil fragrances of green apple & cardamon: benzyl alcohol†, cinnamal†, citral†, citronellol†, geraniol†.
† Component of essential oil
* Certified organic ingredient     
  Product certified organic by BioGro

Directions

Apply caressing into your face, neck and décolletage after cleansing and toning.
